recommendation: Handle Entity Framework migrations properly in container deployments
example:
// Migration patterns for containers
FROM mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:8.0 AS build
WORKDIR /src
COPY . .
RUN dotnet ef migrations bundle --configuration Release --output /app/migrate

FROM mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/aspnet:8.0
WORKDIR /app
COPY --from=build /app/migrate ./
COPY --from=build /app/publish .
# Run migrations in init container or startup
description: Database migrations must be handled carefully in container orchestration
